title: Wisdom Traditions Acupuncture: Guided Meditation
description: Looking for relaxation and clarity? Marni Adhikari of Wisdom Tradition Acupuncture has recorded a 20 minute guided meditation aimed at clearing blocks to healing and peace.
cleaned_text: | | We also recommend guided meditations from the Chopra Center. The Chopra Center, founded in 1996 by Deepak Chopra, M.D. and David Simon, M.D., is the premier provider of experiences, education, teacher trainings and products that improve the health and well-being of body, mind and spirit. They provide an integrative approach to total well-being through self-awareness, and the practice of yoga, meditation, and Ayurveda. Click the link below to view their extensive list of free guided meditations. | | | |
